law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 102, sec. 21, effective July 15, 2014.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/2014). In codification, the Reviser of Statutes has altered the numbering within subsection (11) of this statute from the way it appeared in 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 102, sec. 21, under the authority of KRS 7.136(1)(c).
